meanings.definition: A narrow band or molding used as a decorative element in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The listel added a touch of elegance to the top of the building.
meanings.sent2: The architect included a listel to enhance the design of the structure.
meanings.sent3: The listel decided to take a break from being decorative and tried its hand at being a support beam.
meanings.sent4: The listel, like a graceful dancer, wrapped around the building, adding beauty to its form.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering listel caught the sunlight, making the building stand out.

meanings.definition: A small strip of wood or metal used to separate sections of a window or door.
meanings.sent1: The listel between the glass panes kept them neatly apart.
meanings.sent2: She carefully inserted the listel to divide the window into sections.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous listel played hide and seek between the door panels.
meanings.sent4: The listel acted like a tiny referee, ensuring the window sections stayed in line.
meanings.sent5: With a gentle touch, she slid the listel into place, creating a seamless division.

meanings.definition: A thin border or edging on a piece of furniture or artwork.
meanings.sent1: The intricate listel framed the painting beautifully.
meanings.sent2: He carefully glued the listel around the edge of the table.
meanings.sent3: The rebellious listel decided to switch places with the artwork and become the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The listel, like a delicate frame, highlighted the beauty of the furniture.
meanings.sent5: Running along the edge, the listel completed the artwork, making it truly stunning.
